title: Container With Most Water
algorithmDescription: Find maximum water container area using two pointer technique
detailedDescription: Given n heights, find two lines that form container with maximum water. Area = min(height[i], height[j]) * (j - i). Input: First line has n. Second line has n heights. Output: Maximum water area. Use two pointers starting at ends.
hints: Start with pointers at both ends (maximum width)
Move pointer at shorter line inward (might find taller line)
solutionApproach: Two pointers: left=0, right=n-1. Calculate area with min height and width. Move pointer with smaller height inward. Repeat until pointers meet, tracking max area.
testCaseCriteria: Must achieve O(n) time. Should find optimal container area efficiently.
